Comments_List: Gave additional insight into naval careers and the effects of the US navy on the world stage.
I gained tons of insight on military communities and courtesies.

Pros: meets 1x/week, less than 2 hours (as compared to previous semesters), much more interesting speakers, subjects and activities.
Cons: the Friday time bloc gets in the way of attending other classes.
it can be boring by nature
The course was very formal and taught without care or excitement. Even though this is a military class, it does not need to be taught robotically.
Not unless you want to gain insight into a future naval career.
There are very useful experiences and insights in this course.
No, but it's important information if you actually join the navy.
